content: With reference to Lucho Poletti that says; Satoshi Nakamoto created Bitcoin, but what he really gave us was hope.Hope for a better financial system, Hope for a fairer, more equal world, Hope for a brighter future.I equally agreed with this facts that bitcoin for the digital currency that hopes to build youths careers and stable economy stream of income.It is for freedomÂ  and independent living, it give us an hedge over challenges.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: Quote from: Greggry on April 05, 2023, 04:21:13 AMWith reference to Lucho Poletti that says; Satoshi Nakamoto created Bitcoin, but what he really gave us was hope.Hope for a better financial system, Hope for a fairer, more equal world, Hope for a brighter future.Satoshi did work to code and create Bitcoin and he did not give us hope but a tool to make our financial freedom.It is real and has bigger impacts in society after many years. Satoshi's lesson. A next responsibility is ours, will we take Bitcoin as a tool for our financial freedom or we just hope to see changes in central banks and governmental economic policies?Don't hope, take action!
